title: Score Changed
description: Use to capture details when the lead score of a person changes.

xdm:scoreAttributeID.title: Score Atribute ID
xdm:scoreAttributeID.description: Unique ID of the lead score attribute.

xdm:scoreAttributeName.title: Score Atribute Name
xdm:scoreAttributeName.description: Friendly name of the lead score attribute.

xdm:changeValue.title: Change Value
xdm:changeValue.description: Absolute value or difference between new value and previous value of the lead score attribute.

xdm:newValue.title: New Value
xdm:newValue.description: New value of the lead score attribute.

xdm:oldValue.title: Old Value
xdm:oldValue.description: Previous value of the lead score attribute.

xdm:reason.title: Reason
xdm:reason.description: Reason for the change to the lead score attribute.

xdm:urgency.title: Urgency
xdm:urgency.description: Gauge of how much the lead's score has changed recently.

xdm:priority.title: Priority
xdm:priority.description: Overall priority the lead should receive based on urgency and score.

xdm:relativeScore.title: Relative Score
xdm:relativeScore.description: How the lead's score compares to other leads in the database.

xdm:relativeUrgency.title: Relative Urgency
xdm:relativeUrgency.description: How the lead's urgency compares to other leads in the database.
